doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Burke is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has vehemently opposed any relaxation of Church doctrines regarding homosexuality, abortion, and divorce. He has described same-sex relationships as 'intrinsically disordered' and equated them to grave sins, asserting that such behaviors are contrary to natural law and divine revelation.
sources: [Raymond Leo Burke - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Leo_Burke)
[Raymond Leo Burke - French Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Burke)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Burke is a prominent advocate for the Traditional Latin Mass (Tridentine Mass). He has criticized restrictions imposed on it and has celebrated it publicly, emphasizing its spiritual richness and alignment with the Church's liturgical heritage.
sources: [Cardinal Burke deplores 'persecution' of the Tridentine Mass](https://english.katholisch.de/artikel/52890-cardinal-burke-deplores-persecution-of-the-tridentine-mass)
[Cardinal Burke offers a Pontifical Solemn High Mass (Traditional Latin)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZvDUVGmzRVY)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Burke has taken conservative positions on sociopolitical issues. He has argued that limiting Muslim immigration is a 'responsible' and 'patriotic' act, expressing concerns about the influence of Islam in traditionally Christian societies.
sources: [Cardinal Burke: Limiting Muslim immigration is patriotic](https://www.americamagazine.org/politics-society/2019/05/21/cardinal-burke-limiting-muslim-immigration-patriotic)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Burke has been one of Pope Francis's most vocal critics. He has publicly challenged the Pope's teachings, notably through the 'Dubia' letters questioning the apostolic exhortation Amoris Laetitia. His persistent opposition led Pope Francis to revoke his Vatican privileges, including his apartment and salary.
sources: [Pope Francis punishes leading critic Cardinal Raymond Burke](https://apnews.com/article/vatican-cardinal-burke-conservatives-strickland-163f2d3522a80fa5f908421cc812cfc9)
[Pope Francis responds to dubia submitted by five cardinals](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/pope/news/2023-10/pope-francis-responds-to-dubia-of-five-cardinals.html)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Burke has expressed skepticism towards interreligious dialogue, particularly with Islam. He has stated that Muslims and Christians do not worship the same God and has warned against the dangers of Islamic influence in the West.
sources: [Why Muslims need to hear both Pope Francis and Cardinal Burke](https://cruxnow.com/analysis/2016/09/muslims-need-hear-pope-francis-cardinal-burke)
[Raymond Leo Burke - French Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Burke)

communication.comment: Cardinal Burke's communication style is direct and uncompromising. He has not shied away from publicly criticizing the Pope and other Church leaders, often using strong language to defend traditional doctrines and practices.
sources: [The Cardinal and His Popes](https://divinity.uchicago.edu/sightings/articles/cardinal-and-his-popes)
[Raymond Leo Burke - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Leo_Burke)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Robert Sarah is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has consistently opposed any changes to the Church's stance on issues such as homosexuality, abortion, and gender ideology. He has described homosexuality as 'gravely sinful' and 'at odds with human nature,' and has criticized efforts to bless same-sex unions. His unwavering commitment to doctrinal orthodoxy places him firmly in the conservative camp.
sources: [Cardinal Sarah Speaks Out Against Clergy Blessing Same-Sex Unions](https://www.ncregister.com/cna/cardinal-sarah-speaks-out-against-clergy-blessing-same-sex-unions)
[Cardinal Sarah offers critique of L.G.B.T. book, Father James Martin responds](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2017/08/31/cardinal-sarah-offers-critique-lgbt-book-father-james-martin-responds)
[African cardinal warns of 'demonic gender ideology'](https://cruxnow.com/church/2016/05/african-cardinal-warns-of-demonic-gender-ideology)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Sarah is a prominent advocate for the Traditional Latin Mass and has criticized efforts to restrict it. He has described attempts to abolish the traditional liturgy as a 'diabolical project' and has emphasized the importance of preserving the Church's liturgical heritage. His commitment to traditional worship practices underscores his conservative liturgical stance.
sources: [Cardinal Sarah: Plans to 'abolish' Latin Mass would be 'diabolical'](https://catholicism.org/cardinal-sarah-plans-to-abolish-latin-mass-would-be-diabolical.html)
[Cardinal Sarah Says Latin Mass Youth Give 'Hope' to Church](https://www.catholicarena.com/latest/cardinalsarahlatinmass190923)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Sarah has expressed conservative views on sociopolitical issues, particularly concerning migration and Western cultural trends. He has criticized mass immigration, describing it as a 'new form of slavery' and has warned against the 'cultural colonization' of Africa by Western ideologies. His perspectives reflect a cautious approach to sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Robert Sarah, the conservative champion with slim odds of becoming the first black pope](https://voz.us/en/society/250424/23803/robert-sarah-the-champion-of-conservatives-with-little-chance-of-becoming-the-first-black-pope.html)
[Cardinal Sarah's Warning to the West](https://churchlifejournal.nd.edu/articles/cardinal-sarahs-warning-to-the-west/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: While Cardinal Sarah has publicly affirmed his loyalty to Pope Francis, he has also been a vocal critic of some of the Pope's reforms. Notably, he co-authored a book defending priestly celibacy, which was seen as a challenge to Francis's openness to ordaining married men in certain contexts. His traditionalist views often put him at odds with the current papal agenda.
sources: [Pope Francis tries to set record straight on tensions with Benedict and Cardinal Sarah in new book](https://thecatholicherald.com/pope-francis-tries-to-set-record-straight-on-benedict-and-cardinal-sarah-in-new-book/)
[Cardinal Sarah: To oppose the pope is to be outside the church](https://www.catholicherald.com/article/global/pope-francis/cardinal-sarah-to-oppose-the-pope-is-to-be-outside-the-church/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Sarah advocates for interreligious dialogue but maintains a cautious approach, especially concerning Islam. He has emphasized the importance of Christian unity and has called for vigilance against syncretism. His stance reflects a desire for dialogue rooted in firm Christian identity.
sources: [KENYA: Cardinal Sarah Calls for Interfaith Synergy and Vigilance in Addressing Entrenched Religious Challenges in Africa](https://communications.amecea.org/index.php/2024/03/01/kenya-cardinal-sarah-calls-for-interfaith-synergy-and-vigilance-in-addressing-entrenched-religious-challenges-in-africa/)

communication.comment: Cardinal Sarah is known for his contemplative and solemn communication style. He emphasizes the value of silence and has critiqued the 'noisy' and 'destructive' forms of liturgy. His writings and speeches often reflect a deep spiritual focus, resonating with those who favor a more traditional and introspective approach.
sources: [Cardinal Sarah's pastoral call to “turn to the Lord”](https://www.catholicworldreport.com/2016/11/21/cardinal-sarahs-pastoral-call-to-turn-to-the-lord/)
[Cardinal Sarah Criticizes 'Noisy' and 'Destructive' Forms of Liturgy](https://catholicvote.org/cardinal-sarah-criticizes-noisy-destructive-liturgies/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Cañizares Llovera is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has vocally opposed abortion, euthanasia, and same-sex marriage, equating support for homosexual unions with support for Hitler. His unwavering stance underscores his commitment to conservative moral doctrine.
sources: [Archbishop compares support for homosexual “marriage” with support for Hitler](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/2184/archbishop-compares-support-for-homosexual-marriage-with-support-for-hitler)
[Spanish bishops denounce euthanasia bill](https://www.ncronline.org/news/spanish-bishops-denounce-euthanasia-bill)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As former Prefect of the Congregation for Divine Worship, Cardinal Cañizares Llovera has been a prominent advocate for the Traditional Latin Mass. He has emphasized the importance of liturgical reverence and continuity, reflecting a deep commitment to traditional liturgical practices.
sources: [Reflections on the Traditional Latin Mass by Curial Cardinal](https://insidethevatican.com/news/reflections-traditional-latin-mass-curial-cardinal/)
[Cardinal Cañizares Interview on Three Years of Summorum Pontificum](https://www.newliturgicalmovement.org/2010/07/cardinal-canizares-interview-on-three.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Cañizares Llovera has been critical of progressive social policies, particularly those related to family and life issues. He has publicly challenged government legislation on euthanasia and abortion, positioning himself as a defender of traditional social values.
sources: [Spanish bishops denounce euthanasia bill](https://www.ncronline.org/news/spanish-bishops-denounce-euthanasia-bill)

rapport_au_pape.comment: While Cardinal Cañizares Llovera has expressed support for Pope Francis, there have been instances of tension, particularly regarding liturgical reforms. His traditionalist views sometimes contrast with the Pope's more progressive initiatives.
sources: [The Cañizares Case in Spain is a Litmus Test for Pope Francis](https://onepeterfive.com/canizares-case-spain-litmus-test-pope-francis/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: There is limited information on Cardinal Cañizares Llovera's involvement in interreligious dialogue. His primary focus appears to be on internal Church matters and traditional Catholic teachings.
sources: [Antonio Cañizares Llovera - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Ca%C3%B1izares_Llovera)

communication.comment: Known for his direct and sometimes controversial statements, Cardinal Cañizares Llovera communicates with clarity and conviction. His approach resonates with conservative audiences but has also attracted criticism from progressive sectors.
sources: [Cardinal facing charges for views on gender and 'gay empire'](https://cruxnow.com/global-church/2016/06/cardinal-faces)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Ranjith maintains a staunchly conservative stance on moral issues. He has vocally opposed same-sex marriage, asserting that marriage should only be between a man and a woman, and has warned against legislation promoting homosexuality, abortion, and prostitution. He has also excluded girls from serving as altar servers, citing concerns about priestly vocations.
sources: [Faith leaders oppose bills promoting homosexuality in Sri Lanka](https://www.ucanews.com/news/faith-leaders-oppose-bills-promoting-homosexuality-in-sri-lanka/105856)
[Cardinal Ranjith excludes girls from serving as altar servers in Sri Lanka](https://zenit.org/2024/12/19/cardinal-ranjith-excludes-girls-from-serving-as-altar-servers-in-sri-lanka/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: A prominent advocate for traditional liturgy, Cardinal Ranjith supports the Latin Mass and has criticized post-Vatican II liturgical reforms. He emphasizes the importance of Latin in the liturgy and has called for a 'reform of the reform' to return to the Church's liturgical roots.
sources: [Cardinal Ranjith on Latin in the Liturgy](https://liturgyguy.com/2015/03/25/cardinal-ranjith-on-latin-in-the-liturgy/)
[Cardinal Ranjith: 'The time has come...' Powerful Letter on the Usus Antiquior](https://www.newliturgicalmovement.org/2011/12/cardinal-ranjith-time-has-come-powerful.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Ranjith is actively involved in sociopolitical issues, particularly in advocating for justice and accountability following the 2019 Easter bombings in Sri Lanka. He has also criticized government corruption and called for international assistance during economic crises.
sources: [Sri Lanka's prophetic Church on the side of a suffering people](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/church/news/2022-06/sri-lanka-economic-crisis-church-solidarity-corruption-appeal.html)

[Sri Lankan cardinal demands answers about security lapses after Easter bombings](https://www.americamagazine.org/politics-society/2019/04/23/sri-lankan-cardinal-demands-answers-about-security-lapses-after-easter)

rapport_au_pape.comment: While Cardinal Ranjith has expressed admiration for Pope Francis' compassion and commitment to the poor, he has also publicly opposed some of the Pope's stances, particularly regarding same-sex relationships, indicating a complex relationship.
sources: [Cardinal Ranjith pays tribute to Pope Francis: 'A man who truly represented Jesus Christ'](https://www.themorning.lk/articles/HlnRtO8yVjmMxoKEkiL2)
[Controversy mounts as Cardinal's views defy Pope Francis' stance](https://lankanewsweb.net/archives/59695/same-sex-relations-controversy-mounts-as-cardinals-views-defy-pope-francis-stance/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Ranjith promotes interreligious dialogue in Sri Lanka, emphasizing its importance in a multi-religious society. He has worked to foster harmony among different faith communities, especially following periods of tension.
sources: [Despite violence, Asian Catholic leaders promote interfaith dialogue](https://www.ncronline.org/news/despite-violence-asian-catholic-leaders-promote-interfaith-dialogue)
[Cardinal Ranjith: 'The Pope's visit will be an impetus to reconciliation'](https://www.fides.org/en/news/37080-ASIA_SRI_LANKA_Cardinal_Ranjith_The_Pope_s_visit_will_be_an_impetus_to_reconciliation)

communication.comment: Cardinal Ranjith is known for his direct and uncompromising communication style. He does not shy away from expressing his views on controversial issues, which has both garnered respect and sparked criticism.
sources: [Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith's Recent Rant About Human Rights & His Hypocrisy](https://www.colombotelegraph.com/index.php/cardinal-malcolm-ranjiths-recent-rant-about-human-rights-his-hypocrisy/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Müller is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has vehemently opposed the blessing of same-sex couples, labeling it as 'blasphemy' and contrary to Church doctrine. He also criticizes any attempts to alter the Church's teachings on sexuality, marriage, and family.
sources: [Cardinal Müller calls blessing of homosexual couples 'blasphemy'](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2023/03/24/cardinal-muller-homosexuality-244963)
[Cardinal Müller: Church risks split if it elects a liberal pope](https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/cardinal-mueller-catholic-church-liberal-pope-francis-w6zgtlbnh)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Müller has expressed strong support for traditional liturgical practices. He criticized the restrictions on the Traditional Latin Mass imposed by 'Traditionis Custodes', describing them as lacking empathy for those attached to the old rite and suggesting that the measures aim to suppress the traditional liturgy.
sources: [Cardinal Müller Calls Latin Mass Ban 'Imprudent'](https://www.catholicarena.com/latest/cardinalmullerlatinmass090123)
[Cardinal Müller Criticizes 'Traditionis Custodes' in Preface of New Book](https://edwardpentin.co.uk/cardinal-muller-criticizes-traditionis-custodes-in-preface-of-new-book/)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: While not primarily focused on sociopolitical issues, Müller has engaged in public discourse on topics like the Church's relationship with communism and the importance of moral strength in Europe. He emphasizes the need for the Church to uphold its teachings in the face of secular ideologies.
sources: [Church and Communism: An interview with Cardinal Gerhard Müller](https://www.catholicworldreport.com/2024/05/21/church-and-communism-an-interview-with-cardinal-gerhard-ludwig-muller/)
[Cardinal Müller: To Lead in Europe, Germany Must Recover Moral Strength](https://www.ncregister.com/news/cardinal-mueller-to-lead-in-europe-germany-must-recover-moral-strength)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Müller has been a vocal critic of Pope Francis's reforms, particularly regarding the blessing of same-sex couples and the approach to interfaith relations. He warns that electing another liberal pope could risk a schism in the Church and emphasizes the need for an orthodox leader.
sources: [Cardinal Müller: Church risks split if it elects a liberal pope](https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/cardinal-mueller-catholic-church-liberal-pope-francis-w6zgtlbnh)
[Müller accuses Pope Francis of heresies – that probably went too far](https://english.katholisch.de/artikel/48518-mueller-accuses-pope-francis-of-heresies-that-probably-went-too-far)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: While Müller supports dialogue with other religions, he cautions against any form of relativism. He has criticized Pope Francis's emphasis on interfaith brotherhood, arguing that it should not compromise the uniqueness of the Catholic faith.
sources: [German Cardinal Hopes New Pope Will backtrack on Islam and LGBT issues](https://dazzlingdawn.com/public/2025/04/24/german-cardinal-hopes-new-pope-will-backtrack-on-islam-and-lgbt-issues)

communication.comment: Müller is known for his direct and uncompromising communication style. He openly criticizes what he perceives as deviations from Church doctrine, regardless of potential controversy, and emphasizes the importance of truth over popularity.
sources: [Cardinal Müller: Church risks split if it elects a liberal pope](https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/cardinal-mueller-catholic-church-liberal-pope-francis-w6zgtlbnh)
[Cardinal Müller: Build Your Life on the Rock of Friendship With Christ](https://www.ncregister.com/news/pentin-cardinal-muller-summorum-pontificum)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Eijk is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has consistently opposed abortion, labeling it an 'intrinsic evil,' and has been critical of gender theory, viewing it as a threat to Christian anthropology and the proclamation of the Gospel. He also maintains that same-sex relationships cannot be blessed, as they contradict God's order of creation.
sources: [Cardinal Willem Jacobus Eijk - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/willem-jacobus-eijk/)
['Gender theory' is a 'threat' to proclamation of the Gospel: Dutch Cardinal](https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/gender-theory-is-a-threat-to-proclamation-of-the-gospel-dutch-cardinal/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Eijk emphasizes the importance of traditional liturgy and doctrine. He has warned against deviations from the universal Church's teachings and liturgical practices, drawing parallels between contemporary synodal discussions and past events that led to secularization in the Netherlands.
sources: [Dutch Cardinal: Don't repeat our mistakes! Those ... - RORATE CÆLI](https://rorate-caeli.blogspot.com/2024/10/dutch-cardinal-dont-repeat-our-mistakes.html)
[Dutch cardinal advocates Christ-centered reform over controversy](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/259875/dutch-cardinal-advocates-christ-centered-reform-over-controversial-issues)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: While Cardinal Eijk has addressed societal issues, his primary focus remains on spiritual and doctrinal matters. He has highlighted the challenges of secularization and the need for the Church to maintain its teachings amidst societal changes.
sources: [Observations and lessons from a 'poor Church in a rich country.'](https://www.catholicworldreport.com/2024/03/05/observations-and-lessons-from-a-poor-church-in-a-rich-country/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Eijk has expressed concerns about certain decisions made during Pope Francis's pontificate. He criticized the lack of clarity in the Pope's response to the German bishops' proposal on intercommunion and has called for definitive teachings on contentious issues to prevent confusion among the faithful.
sources: [Cardinal Eijk: Pope Francis Needed to Give Clarity on Intercommunion](https://www.ncregister.com/blog/cardinal-eijk-pope-francis-needed-to-give-clarity-on-intercommunion)
[Cardinal Eijk, Pope Francis, and problems of governance](https://www.catholicworldreport.com/2018/05/12/cardinal-eijk-pope-francis-and-problems-of-governance/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Eijk acknowledges the importance of interreligious dialogue but emphasizes that it should not compromise core Catholic doctrines. He has participated in discussions but remains cautious about theological relativism.
sources: [Eijk and the 'ecumenical case' concerning the Council of Trent](https://www.lastampa.it/vatican-insider/en/2014/01/27/news/eijk-and-the-ecumenical-case-concerning-the-council-of-trent-1.35939757/)

communication.comment: Known for his clear and direct communication style, Cardinal Eijk does not shy away from addressing controversial topics. He emphasizes the need for the Church to provide unambiguous teachings to guide the faithful in a secularized society.
sources: [Dutch cardinal could get papal successor boost after response to Fiducia Supplicans](https://thecatholicherald.com/dutch-cardinal-could-get-papal-successor-boost-after-response-to-fiducia-supplicans/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Ryłko is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has emphasized the importance of chastity, the sanctity of marriage, and the family unit. He has criticized the sexual revolution for reducing love to mere pleasure and has warned against gender ideology, which he sees as undermining the natural order of human sexuality. His views align closely with the teachings of Pope John Paul II and Benedict XVI.
sources: [The Holy See - Roman Curia - Pontifical Council for the Laity](https://www.vatican.va/roman_curia/pontifical_councils/laity/laity_en/pubblicazioni/rc_pc_laity_doc_20101008_notiziario-20-2010_en.html)

[Cardinal Ryłko: Gospel demands couples 'go against current' of dominant culture](https://www.archivioradiovaticana.va/storico/2014/10/02/cardinal_ry%C5%82ko_gospel_demands_couples_go_against_current_of/en-1107766)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Ryłko has shown a strong commitment to traditional liturgical practices. He has been involved in efforts to approve the liturgical celebrations of movements like the Neocatechumenal Way, reflecting his support for preserving traditional forms of worship within the Church.
sources: [That Strange Mass the Pope Doesn't Like - Chiesa](https://chiesa.espresso.repubblica.it/articolo/1350217bdc4.html?eng=y)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: While not overtly political, Cardinal Ryłko has expressed concerns about secularization and the erosion of Christian values in society. He emphasizes the role of the laity in evangelization and upholding moral standards, reflecting a conservative approach to sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Cardinal Stanisław Ryłko - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/stanislaw-rylko/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Ryłko has maintained a respectful relationship with Pope Francis. While his traditional views may not fully align with the Pope's more progressive reforms, he continues to serve in significant roles, indicating a level of mutual respect and cooperation.
sources: [Cardinal Stanislaw Rylko named archpriest of Rome basilica | Crux](https://cruxnow.com/vatican/2016/12/cardinal-stanislaw-rylko-named-archpriest-rome-basilica)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: There is limited public information on Cardinal Ryłko's involvement in interreligious dialogue. However, his roles within the Vatican suggest a standard engagement with such initiatives, aligning with the Church's broader efforts in this area.
sources: [Pontifical Councils - EasyDiplomacy](https://easydiplomacy.com/en/info-directory/factsheets/vatican/pontifical-councils/)

communication.comment: Cardinal Ryłko is known for his clear and direct communication style, often emphasizing traditional Church teachings. His public addresses reflect a focus on doctrinal clarity and the importance of maintaining the Church's moral compass.
sources: [Cardinal Stanisław Ryłko to Friends of the John Paul II Foundation](https://fjp2.com/cardinal-stanislaw-rylko-to-friends-of-the-john-paul-ii-foundation/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Tsarahazana is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He emphasizes the sanctity of marriage as a union between a man and a woman, rooted in procreation and family continuity. He has publicly opposed modern ideologies that seek to redefine family structures, stating that such ideas are not acceptable in Madagascar.
sources: [Cardinal in Madagascar Defends Traditional Family Values](https://www.aciafrica.org/news/11843/cardinal-in-madagascar-defends-traditional-family-values-advocates-for-deepening-faith-unity-amid-global-challenges)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Tsarahazana upholds traditional liturgical practices while recognizing the need for deeper faith among Christians. He emphasizes that faith should be lived authentically, not just practiced outwardly, and has been involved in initiatives to deepen the spiritual life of the faithful.
sources: [Cardinal in Madagascar Blames Country's Deteriorating Social Structures on Corruption](https://www.aciafrica.org/news/6312/cardinal-in-madagascar-blames-countrys-deteriorating-social-structures-on-corruption)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Tsarahazana demonstrates a strong commitment to social justice, particularly in serving the poor and marginalized. He has actively engaged in issues related to poverty, corruption, and social inclusion, aligning with progressive sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Cardinal in Madagascar Blames Country's Deteriorating Social Structures on Corruption](https://www.aciafrica.org/news/6312/cardinal-in-madagascar-blames-countrys-deteriorating-social-structures-on-corruption)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Tsarahazana supports the Pope's reforms and vision for a Church that reaches out to all. He has defended Pope Francis against criticisms and aligns with his emphasis on pastoral care and inclusivity.
sources: [New Madagascar Cardinal Focuses on Peace and the Gospel](https://secam.org/new-madagascar-cardinal-focuses-on-peace-and-the-gospel/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Tsarahazana promotes interreligious dialogue, recognizing its importance in a pluralistic society. He encourages engagement with different faith traditions to foster mutual understanding and peace.
sources: [Cardinal in Madagascar Defends Traditional Family Values](https://www.aciafrica.org/news/11843/cardinal-in-madagascar-defends-traditional-family-values-advocates-for-deepening-faith-unity-amid-global-challenges)

communication.comment: Known for his effective communication and pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal Tsarahazana emphasizes the need for the Church to engage with modern culture and technology. He advocates for a Church that listens and speaks in ways that resonate with contemporary society.
sources: [Cardinal in Madagascar Blames Country's Deteriorating Social Structures on Corruption](https://www.aciafrica.org/news/6312/cardinal-in-madagascar-blames-countrys-deteriorating-social-structures-on-corruption)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Woelki has consistently upheld traditional Catholic teachings on moral issues. He has publicly opposed the blessing of same-sex unions and has taken disciplinary actions against priests who conducted such blessings. His stance reflects a firm commitment to the Church's doctrines on sexuality and family.
sources: [German cardinal under fire for admonishing priest over same-sex blessings](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/254958/german-cardinal-under-fire-for-admonishing-priest-over-same-sex-blessings)

[German bishops rejected plan for Francis-style 'Priority of Evangelization' in synodal path](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/42224/german-bishops-rejected-plan-for-francis-style-priority-of-evangelization-in-synodal-path)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Woelki emphasizes the importance of traditional liturgical practices. He has warned against creating 'a new Church' and has expressed concerns over liturgical innovations that deviate from established norms, indicating a preference for traditional liturgy.
sources: [Cologne's cardinal warns against inventing 'a new Church'](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/colognes-cardinal-warns-against-inventing-a-new-church-98558)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Despite his conservative theological views, Cardinal Woelki has demonstrated progressive actions in sociopolitical matters. Notably, he celebrated Mass atop a refugee boat to highlight the plight of migrants, criticizing European indifference to their suffering.
sources: [The 'Refugee Crisis' and Religious Tolerance in Europe: Plurality of ...](https://www.cebam.pl/_files/ugd/a61642_d1b8ba7468784d94bcb794ea84381b43.pdf?index=true)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Woelki's relationship with Pope Francis has been complex. While he has shown loyalty to the Pope, he has also faced criticism for his handling of abuse cases, leading to a temporary leave granted by the Pope. His conservative stance often contrasts with the Pope's more progressive reforms.

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Collins has consistently upheld traditional Catholic teachings on moral issues. doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Sturla maintains a firm stance on traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has publicly opposed abortion, expressing hope that it will eventually be recognized as a cruelty and prohibited. Additionally, he has rejected the blessing of same-sex unions, emphasizing adherence to established Church doctrine.
sources: [Kard. Sturla: Wierzę, że aborcja zostanie uznana za okrucieństwo i zakazana](https://www.ekai.pl/kard-sturla-wierze-ze-aborcja-zostanie-uznana-za-okrucienstwo-i-zakazana/)
[Daniel Fernando Sturla Berhouet - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Sturla)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As a Salesian, Cardinal Sturla emphasizes the importance of traditional liturgical practices rooted in the Catholic faith. He has been instrumental in promoting the unique liturgical heritage of the Church in Uruguay.
sources: [Daniel Fernando Sturla Berhouet - Vatican Press Office](https://press.vatican.va/content/salastampa/en/documentation/cardinali_biografie/cardinali_bio_sturla-berhouet_df.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Sturla demonstrates a strong commitment to social justice, particularly in serving the poor and marginalized. He has actively engaged in issues related to migration, poverty, and social inclusion, aligning with progressive sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Uruguayan cardinal-designate works on peripheries, like Francis](https://www.ncronline.org/news/uruguayan-cardinal-designate-works-peripheries-francis)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Sturla supports the Pope's reforms and vision for a Church that reaches out to all. He has defended Pope Francis against criticisms and aligns with his emphasis on pastoral care and inclusivity.
sources: [Daniel Fernando Sturla Berhouet - Vatican Press Office](https://press.vatican.va/content/salastampa/en/documentation/cardinali_biografie/cardinali_bio_sturla-berhouet_df.html)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Sturla promotes interreligious dialogue, recognizing its importance in a pluralistic society. He encourages engagement with different faith traditions to foster mutual understanding and peace.
sources: [Daniel Fernando Sturla Berhouet - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Sturla)

communication.comment: Known for his effective communication and pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal Sturla emphasizes the need for the Church to engage with modern culture and technology. He advocates for a Church that listens and speaks in ways that resonate with contemporary society.
sources: [Daniel Fernando Sturla Berhouet - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Sturla)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal John Njue has consistently upheld traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has strongly opposed same-sex relationships, describing them as 'un-African' and a violation of biblical teachings, asserting that such relations 'ruin the moral fabric of societies'. He has also led campaigns against abortion, emphasizing that 'abortion is killing an innocent person' and urging Catholics to petition authorities to stop discussions on legalizing it.
sources: [Cardinal John Njue - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/john-njue/)

[Cardinal Njue leads Catholics in the fight against abortion](https://www.fides.org/en/news/18073-AFRICA_KENYA_Cardinal_Njue_leads_Catholics_in_the_fight_against_abortion_start_submitting_signatures_so_that_after_gathering_them_in_their_millions_we_move_to_petition_the_competent_authorities_to_stop_this_campaign_of_discussing_how_to_kill_the_unborn_babies)
[Njue: Cardinal who chided Obama over gay rights](https://www.the-star.co.ke/news/2021-01-04-njue-cardinal-who-chided-obama-over-gay-rights)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While specific statements on liturgical practices are limited, Cardinal Njue's overall conservative stance suggests a traditional approach to liturgy and a preference for established rituals and practices.
sources: [John Njue - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Njue)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Njue has been an influential voice in Kenyan sociopolitical matters. He has advocated for peace and justice, especially during times of political unrest, and has called for dialogue to resolve violence. However, his skepticism towards foreign-developed vaccines, suggesting hidden negative agendas, indicates a cautious approach to certain global health initiatives.
sources: [Catholic bishops appeal for dialogue to resolve violence](https://www.archbalt.org/catholic-bishops-appeal-for-dialogue-to-resolve-violence/?print=print)
[Cardinal John Njue - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/john-njue/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Njue was appointed by Pope Benedict XVI and has served under Pope Francis. While he has represented Pope Francis at events, such as the 150th jubilee of evangelization in Tanzania, there is limited information on his alignment with Pope Francis's reforms, suggesting a neutral stance.
sources: [TANZANIA: Pope Francis Delegates Cardinal Njue to represent him at 150 Jubilee of Evangelization in Tanzania](https://communications.amecea.org/index.php/2018/10/26/tanzania-pope-francis-appoints-cardinal-njue-to-represent-him-at-150-jubilee-of-evangelization-in-tanzania/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Njue has called for 'frank and intelligent' interfaith dialogue, emphasizing the importance of sincere intentions in discussions with other religions. He has participated in events promoting human fraternity and world peace, reflecting a commitment to interreligious dialogue.
sources: [Kenyan cardinal calls for 'frank and intelligent' interfaith dialogue](https://premierchristian.news/us/news/article/kenyan-cardinal-calls-for-frank-and-intelligent-interfaith-dialogue)

[KENYA: Religious Leaders Discuss Pope Francis' Document On Placing Human Fraternity And World Peace](https://communications.amecea.org/index.php/2019/06/21/kenya-religious-leaders-discuss-pope-francis-document-on-placing-human-fraternity-and-world-peace/)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal Njue engages with the faithful through thoughtful homilies and public statements. He emphasizes the Church's role in addressing contemporary societal challenges while remaining rooted in tradition.
sources: [Cardinal Njue: I'll still carry on with pastoral duties](https://www.the-star.co.ke/news/2021-03-13-cardinal-njue-ill-still-carry-on-with-pastoral-duties)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Puljić has consistently upheld traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has publicly opposed abortion, describing it as a scourge that undermines the moral and cultural traditions of the people. Additionally, he has criticized progressive movements within the Church, such as Germany's Synodal Way, for promoting ideas he considers alien to the Church's tradition.
sources: [Bosnian cardinal: Synodal Way’s ‘exotic ideas’ alien to a Church that survived communism](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/247809/bosnian-cardinal-synodal-ways-exotic-ideas-alien-to-a-church-that-survived-communism)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Puljić values liturgical tradition and has expressed concerns about certain liturgical practices. For instance, he has noted that the current placement of the sign of peace in the Mass can overshadow the Communion rite, suggesting a preference for traditional liturgical structures.
sources: [The Holy See - Synod of Bishops Bulletin](https://www.vatican.va/news_services/press/sinodo/documents/bollettino_21_xi-ordinaria-2005/02_inglese/b17_02.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Throughout his tenure, Cardinal Puljić has been actively involved in socio-political issues, especially during the Bosnian War. He provided aid to refugees, advocated for peace, and emphasized the Church's role in social reconstruction and reconciliation in post-conflict Bosnia and Herzegovina.
sources: [Cardinal Vinko Puljić - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/vinko-puljic/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: While maintaining respect for the papacy, Cardinal Puljić has expressed reservations about certain initiatives under Pope Francis, particularly the Synodal Way, which he views as introducing ideas alien to the Church's tradition.
sources: [Bosnian cardinal: Synodal Way’s ‘exotic ideas’ alien to a Church that survived communism](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/247809/bosnian-cardinal-synodal-ways-exotic-ideas-alien-to-a-church-that-survived-communism)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Puljić has been a proponent of interreligious dialogue in Bosnia and Herzegovina. He was a founding member of the Interreligious Council of Bosnia and Herzegovina, working towards fostering understanding and cooperation among different faith communities.
sources: [Consiglio interreligioso della Bosnia ed Erzegovina](https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Consiglio_interreligioso_della_Bosnia_ed_Erzegovina)

communication.comment: Cardinal Puljić is known for his straightforward and candid communication style. He has not shied away from addressing controversial topics and has been vocal in expressing his views on various issues affecting the Church and society.
sources: [Cardinal Vinko Puljić: Synodal Way's 'exotic ideas' alien to a Church that survived communism](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/247809/bosnian-cardinal-synodal-ways-exotic-ideas-alien-to-a-church-that-survived-communism)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Dominique Mamberti is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings, particularly emphasizing the sanctity of life and the dignity of the human person. His tenure as Secretary for Relations with States showcased his commitment to upholding the Church's moral positions in international forums.
sources: [Cardinals: Defenders of the Faith - Inside The Vatican](https://insidethevatican.com/magazine/lead-story/cardinals-defenders-faith/)
[Dominique Mamberti - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominique_Mamberti)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As Prefect of the Apostolic Signatura, Cardinal Mamberti has shown a deep respect for the Church's liturgical traditions and canonical norms. His role underscores his dedication to preserving the integrity of liturgical practices and Church discipline.
sources: [Dominique Mamberti - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominique_Mamberti)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Mamberti has actively engaged in sociopolitical issues, advocating for religious freedom, peace, and ethical governance. His diplomatic efforts often highlight the Church's concern for the marginalized and the importance of moral values in public policy.
sources: [The common good is the center of Holy See's international agenda](https://www.mondayvatican.com/holy-see/the-common-good-is-the-center-of-holy-sees-international-agenda-chronicles-from-the-studium-aquinatis-part-i)
[Dominique Mamberti - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominique_Mamberti)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Mamberti has served under multiple pontificates, maintaining a collaborative relationship with the popes. His appointments to significant roles within the Curia reflect the trust placed in him by the Holy See.
sources: [Dominique Mamberti - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominique_Mamberti)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: With extensive diplomatic experience, Cardinal Mamberti has emphasized the importance of interreligious dialogue, particularly in promoting peace and mutual understanding among different faith traditions.
sources: [For Cardinal Mamberti, dialogue with Muslims is a must](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/31976/for-cardinal-mamberti-dialogue-with-muslims-is-a-must)
[High-Level Dialogue on Interreligious and Intercultural Understanding](https://www.vatican.va/roman_curia/secretariat_state/2007/documents/rc_seg-st_20071005_interrelg-dialogue_en.html)

communication.comment: Known for his diplomatic acumen, Cardinal Mamberti communicates the Church's positions with clarity and precision, effectively representing the Holy See in complex international settings.
sources: [Dominique Mamberti - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominique_Mamberti)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Arborelius upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, including opposition to abortion and same-sex marriage. He has publicly urged Catholics in Sweden to advocate for the protection of unborn life, emphasizing the Church's stance on these issues.
sources: [Swedish cardinal urges Catholics to make voices heard on abortion issue](https://catholicreview.org/swedish-cardinal-urges-catholics-to-make-voices-heard-on-abortion-issue/)
[Church growing in Sweden, says Cardinal Arborelius](https://aleteia.org/2025/02/14/anti-catholic-prejudice-disappearing-in-sweden-says-cardinal)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While Cardinal Arborelius supports traditional liturgical practices, he also appreciates the importance of adapting liturgy to local contexts. He has praised Pope Francis' decision to grant local bishops' conferences more authority over liturgical translations, reflecting a balanced approach to tradition and adaptation.
sources: [Sweden's Cardinal Arborelius praises liturgical translation reform](https://www.ncronline.org/news/swedens-cardinal-arborelius-praises-liturgical-translation-reform)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Arborelius is actively engaged in social issues, advocating for migrants and highlighting the challenges of spiritual poverty in Sweden. He emphasizes the Church's role in addressing both material and spiritual needs in society.
sources: [Swedish Card. Arborelius talks poverty and immigrants in new titular church in Rome](https://www.romereports.com/en/2018/01/06/swedish-card-arborelius-talks-poverty-and-immigrants-in-new-titular-church-in-rome/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Appointed cardinal by Pope Francis, Cardinal Arborelius aligns closely with the Pope's vision for a Church that reaches out to the peripheries. He has expressed admiration for Pope Francis' efforts to bring the Gospel to marginalized communities.
sources: [Swedish cardinal among favourites to become next pope rules self out](https://www.vanguardngr.com/2025/04/swedish-cardinal-among-favourites-to-become-next-pope-rules-self-out/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Arborelius is committed to interreligious dialogue, participating in ecumenical initiatives and promoting understanding among different faith communities in Sweden.
sources: [Swedish Catholic cardinal, Lutheran bishop make joint DC visit for ecumenical dialogue](https://www.ncronline.org/news/swedish-catholic-cardinal-lutheran-bishop-make-joint-dc-visit-ecumenical-dialogue)

communication.comment: Known for his humility and effective communication, Cardinal Arborelius engages with both Catholic and secular audiences. His approachable demeanor and emphasis on listening have earned him respect across various communities.
sources: [Cardinal Anders Arborelius - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/anders-arborelius/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Betori has consistently upheld traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has publicly opposed same-sex civil unions and supported the Vatican's 2005 directive banning the ordination of homosexuals, emphasizing that priesthood is a 'gift' rather than a 'right'.
sources: [Giuseppe Betori - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giuseppe_Betori)
[Amoris Laetitia and the Post-Modern Papacy of Pope Francis](https://crisismagazine.com/opinion/amoris-laetitia-post-modern-papacy-pope-francis)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While not overtly aligned with traditionalist movements, Cardinal Betori has shown a strong commitment to liturgical tradition. His academic background in Sacred Scripture and his role in translating the Catechism into Italian reflect a deep respect for doctrinal and liturgical continuity.
sources: [Giuseppe Betori - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giuseppe_Betori)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Betori has demonstrated a commitment to social justice issues. He has addressed the plight of the homeless in Florence and emphasized the Church's role in promoting social inclusion and addressing poverty.
sources: [Firenze, omelia del cardinale Betori dell’8 gennaio](https://www.firenzepost.it/2017/01/08/firenze-omelia-del-cardinale-betori-dell8-gennaio-un-clochard-e-morto-a-firenze-nonostante-la-presenza-delle-benemerite-associazioni/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Betori has maintained a respectful relationship with Pope Francis, participating in Vatican initiatives and serving on various councils. While he upholds traditional teachings, he has not been publicly critical of the Pope's reforms.
sources: [Giuseppe Betori - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giuseppe_Betori)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Betori has actively promoted interreligious dialogue. Notably, he facilitated the sale of Church land in Florence for the construction of a mosque, emphasizing the importance of religious freedom and coexistence.
sources: [Florence Archdiocese in Talks to Sell Land to Muslims to Build Mosque](https://catholiccitizens.org/views/89292/florence-archdiocese-in-talks-to-sell-land-to-muslims-to-build-mosque/)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal Betori engages with the faithful through thoughtful homilies and public statements. He emphasizes the Church's role in addressing contemporary societal challenges while remaining rooted in tradition.
sources: [We must know how to manage our beauty. Interview with Archbishop Betori of Florence](https://www.finestresullarte.info/en/interviews/we-must-know-how-to-manage-our-beauty-interview-with-archbishop-betori-of-florence)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Filoni is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. His extensive background in philosophy and canon law, along with his service in various Vatican roles, underscores his commitment to upholding the Church's moral doctrine.
sources: [Fernando Filoni - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_Filoni)
[FILONI Card. Fernando - The Holy See](https://press.vatican.va/content/salastampa/en/documentation/cardinali_biografie/cardinali_bio_filoni_f.html)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Filoni demonstrates a deep respect for liturgical tradition and ecclesiastical discipline. His tenure as Prefect of the Congregation for the Evangelization of Peoples reflects his commitment to preserving the integrity of liturgical practices within the Church.
sources: [Cardinal Filoni describes God as the author of his work - Vatican News](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/vatican-city/news/2019-12/cardinal-filoni-prefect-emeritus-congregation-evangelisation.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Filoni demonstrates a strong commitment to social justice, particularly in serving the poor and marginalized. He has actively engaged in issues related to poverty, corruption, and social inclusion, aligning with progressive sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Cardinal Filoni: Iraqi Christians Have the Fundamental Human Right to Remain on Their Historic Lands](https://www.ncregister.com/interview/cardinal-filoni-iraqi-christians-have-the-fundamental-human-right-to-remain-on-their-historic-lands)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Filoni has maintained a collaborative relationship with Pope Francis, notably serving in various capacities within the Church. His appointments reflect the trust placed in him by the Holy See.
sources: [Cardinal Filoni: Benedict XVI was 'a prophet of our times'](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/vatican-city/news/2023-01/filoni-benedict-xvi-a-prophet-of-our-time.html)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: With extensive diplomatic experience, Cardinal Filoni has emphasized the importance of interreligious dialogue, particularly in promoting peace and mutual understanding among different faith traditions.
sources: [Cardinal Filoni in Chiang Mai: testimony and dialogue foundations of the Church's mission](https://www.fides.org/en/news/66060-VATICAN_Cardinal_Filoni_in_Chiang_Mai_testimony_and_dialogue_foundations_of_the_Church_s_mission)

communication.comment: Known for his diplomatic acumen, Cardinal Filoni communicates the Church's positions with clarity and precision, effectively representing the Holy See in complex international settings.
sources: [Cardinal Filoni on the Mission of the Church in Current Times](https://www.ncregister.com/cna/cardinal-filoni-on-the-mission-of-the-church-in-current-times)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal DiNardo is a staunch defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has consistently opposed abortion, describing it as a direct attack on life that also wounds the woman and undermines the family. He has also opposed same-sex marriage, emphasizing the Church's understanding of marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
sources: [Cardinal DiNardo Issues Respect Life Month Statement | USCCB](https://www.usccb.org/news/2011/cardinal-dinardo-issues-respect-life-month-statement)

[How the U.S. Catholic Bishops Reacted to Supreme Court's Decision on Same-Sex Marriage](https://aleteia.org/2015/07/06/how-the-u-s-catholic-bishops-reacted-to-supreme-courts-decision-on-same-sex-marriage)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal DiNardo has shown a deep appreciation for traditional liturgical practices. He has celebrated the Anglican Use liturgy and emphasized the importance of maintaining liturgical norms. However, he has also implemented restrictions on the Traditional Latin Mass in line with 'Traditionis Custodes'.
sources: [Cardinal DiNardo, the Book of Divine Worship, and Thoughts on Anglican Use](https://www.newliturgicalmovement.org/2009/06/cardinal-dinardo-book-of-divine-worship.html)

[Implementation of Traditionis Custodes within the Archdiocese of Galveston-Houston](https://www.archgh.org/news-events/news/cardinals-corner/cardinals-corner/implementation-of-traditionis-custodes-within-the-archdiocese-of-galveston-houston/)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal DiNardo has been vocal on social issues, advocating for immigration reform and addressing racism. He has called for comprehensive immigration policies and has spoken out against racism, emphasizing the need for societal change.
sources: [Civility must guide debate on social challenges, USCCB president says](https://www.ncronline.org/news/civility-must-guide-debate-social-challenges-usccb-president-says)
[Combatting Racism - Archdiocese of Galveston-Houston](https://www.archgh.org/resources/combatting-racism/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: While Cardinal DiNardo has collaborated with Pope Francis, especially during his tenure as president of the USCCB, he has also maintained a distinct voice on certain issues. He has expressed both support and independent perspectives in alignment with his pastoral responsibilities.
sources: [President of U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops Renews Commitment for Greater Effectiveness and Transparency in Disciplining Bishops](https://www.usccb.org/news/2018/president-us-conference-catholic-bishops-renews-commitment-greater-effectiveness-and)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal DiNardo has actively participated in interreligious dialogue, reaffirming commitments to mutual understanding and cooperation among different faith traditions.
sources: [Cardinal DiNardo, religious leaders re-affirm Nostra Aetate's commitment to interreligious relations](https://www.archgh.org/news-events/news/texas-catholic-herald/texas-catholic-herald-news/texas-catholic-herald/cardinal-dinardo-religious-leaders-re-affirm-nostra-aetate-s-commitment-to-interreligious-relations/)

communication.comment: Known for his thoughtful and measured communication style, Cardinal DiNardo emphasizes the importance of civility and clarity in addressing complex issues within the Church and society.
sources: [Head of U.S. bishops: We must resist the division caused by hot-button issues](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2017/11/13/head-us-bishops-we-must-resist-division-caused-hot-button-issues)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Baselios Cleemis upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, including opposition to abortion and same-sex marriage. While he has not made extensive public statements on these issues, his alignment with official Church doctrine and his role in enforcing liturgical reforms suggest a commitment to maintaining established moral positions.
sources: [Baselios Cleemis - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baselios_Cleemis)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As Major Archbishop-Catholicos of the Syro-Malankara Catholic Church, Cardinal Cleemis emphasizes the importance of traditional liturgical practices rooted in the Antiochene rite. He has been instrumental in preserving and promoting the unique liturgical heritage of the Syro-Malankara Church.
sources: [Baselios Cleemis - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baselios_Cleemis)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Cleemis demonstrates a strong commitment to social justice, particularly in serving the poor and marginalized. He has actively engaged in issues related to migration, poverty, and social inclusion, aligning with progressive sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Cardinal Cleemis Baselios - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/cleemis-baselios/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Cleemis supports the Pope's reforms and vision for a Church that reaches out to all. He has defended Pope Francis against criticisms and aligns with his emphasis on pastoral care and inclusivity.

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Souraphiel upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, including opposition to abortion and same-sex marriage. In 2008, he joined other Ethiopian religious leaders in encouraging lawmakers to outlaw homosexual activity in the country's constitution, calling it 'an infestation.' In 2014, the Catholic Association of Member Episcopal Conferences in Eastern Africa, which he heads, issued a statement in support of marriage, stating, 'we strongly condemn same sex unions and other deviations that go against human nature and natural laws.'
sources: [Go forth and preach the Gospel](https://www.americamagazine.org/content/dispatches/go-forth-and-preach-gospel-berhaneyesus-demerew-souraphiel-addis-ababa-ethiopia)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As head of the Ethiopian Catholic Church, Cardinal Souraphiel emphasizes the importance of traditional liturgical practices rooted in the Ge'ez rite. He has been instrumental in preserving and promoting the unique liturgical heritage of the Ethiopian Catholic Church.
sources: [Preaching Challenges in Ethiopia](https://catholicexchange.com/preaching-challenges-in-ethiopia/)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Souraphiel demonstrates a strong commitment to social justice. He has actively engaged in issues related to peace, reconciliation, and social inclusion in Ethiopia, aligning with progressive sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Cardinal Souraphiel: the Church is close to the people suffering in Ethiopia](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/church/news/2024-07/cardinal-souraphiel-church-is-close-to-the-people-in-ethiopia.html)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Souraphiel supports the Pope's reforms and vision for a Church that reaches out to all. He has defended Pope Francis against criticisms and aligns with his emphasis on pastoral care and inclusivity.
sources: [Ethiopian Catholic Church Grieving Death of Pope Francis](https://www.ena.et/web/eng/w/eng_6443104)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Souraphiel promotes interreligious dialogue, recognizing its importance in a pluralistic society. He has highlighted the Catholic Church's foundational role in the Inter-Religious Council of Ethiopia.
sources: [Ethiopian Cardinal: Amidst the devastation and destruction there is hope](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/church/news/2024-07/hope-in-ethiopia-despite-the-conflicts.html)

communication.comment: Known for his effective communication and pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal Souraphiel emphasizes the need for the Church to engage with modern culture and technology. He advocates for a Church that listens and speaks in ways that resonate with contemporary society.
sources: [Cardinal-designate Serves the Poor in Ethiopia: He stayed, hopes others will too](https://www.americamagazine.org/issue/cardinal-designate-serves-poor-ethiopia)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Rugambwa has consistently emphasized adherence to traditional Catholic teachings. He has expressed concerns about the spread of ideologies promoting 'exaggerated freedom' and secular influences, particularly in Africa. His apprehension towards gender ideology and the challenges posed by other Christian denominations indicate a conservative stance on moral doctrines.
sources: [Catholic Church in Africa is Booming, But Faces 'Big Challenges'](https://www.ncregister.com/interview/an-interview-with-cardinal-protase-rugambwa-church-in-africa)
[Protase - Rugambwa - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/protase-rugambwa/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While there is no direct evidence of Cardinal Rugambwa's preference for the Tridentine Mass, his traditionalist views suggest a conservative approach to liturgy. His emphasis on maintaining the discipline of Christian discipleship and his role in the Dicastery for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments further support this inference.
sources: [Protase Rugambwa - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Protase_Rugambwa)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal De Donatis upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, including opposition to abortion and same-sex marriage. liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As Vicar General of Rome, Cardinal De Donatis implemented strict regulations on the Traditional Latin Mass following Pope Francis' motu proprio 'Traditionis Custodes.' He restricted its celebration during the Easter Triduum and required priests to obtain written authorization to celebrate the 1962 Missal, demonstrating a commitment to liturgical uniformity.
sources: [Rome diocese bans Traditional Latin Mass for Easter Triduum](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/249546/traditionis-custodes-rome-diocese-bans-traditional-latin-mass-for-easter-triduum)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal De Donatis has shown a commitment to social issues, notably in environmental education. As Grand Chancellor of the Pontifical Lateran University, he oversaw the establishment of a program in Ecology and the Environment, aligning with Pope Francis' emphasis on care for creation.
sources: [Pope: Environmental studies are beneficial to all - Vatican News](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/pope/news/2021-10/pope-francis-letter-angelo-de-donatis-pontifical-lateran.html)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Initially a close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal De Donatis' relationship with the Pope has experienced some tension. While he was appointed to significant roles, including Major Penitentiary, reports suggest disagreements over diocesan reforms and administrative decisions.
sources: [Vicar of Rome latest papal confidante to fall out of favor - Crux Now](https://cruxnow.com/news-analysis/2023/01/vicar-of-rome-latest-papal-confidante-to-fall-out-of-favor)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Mario Aurelio Poli has consistently upheld traditional Catholic teachings on moral issues. doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Ambongo Besungu is a strong defender of traditional Catholic moral teachings. He has explicitly opposed the Vatican declaration *Fiducia Supplicans*, which permits blessings for same-sex couples, stating that such ideas are unacceptable in the African context and constitute 'cultural colonization'.

[Reuters - African response to Fiducia Supplicans](https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/africans-root-first-black-pope-modern-history-2025-04-22/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While not known for an explicit focus on liturgical debates, Cardinal Ambongo emphasizes reverent and faithful expressions of worship and promotes a liturgy that fosters spiritual renewal. His Capuchin background and his advocacy for deeper faith formation suggest a traditional but pastoral orientation.
sources: [Fridolin Ambongo Besungu - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fridolin_Ambongo_Besungu)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Ambongo is highly engaged in sociopolitical issues. He is known for defending human rights, denouncing political corruption, and advocating for peace and environmental protection. He has also spoken strongly against the exploitation of the Congo's natural resources.
sources: [Fridolin Ambongo Besungu - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fridolin_Ambongo_Besungu)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Ambongo is a close ally of Pope Francis. [Fridolin Ambongo Besungu - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fridolin_Ambongo_Besungu)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Ambongo strongly promotes interreligious dialogue, particularly in the context of conflict in the DRC. He advocates collaboration with Muslim leaders and other faith groups as essential for peacebuilding and social harmony.

[Fridolin Ambongo Besungu - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fridolin_Ambongo_Besungu)

communication.comment: Cardinal Ambongo is known for his bold and prophetic communication style. He speaks directly on political and moral issues, often challenging the government, while also maintaining a pastoral tone. His statements often reach wide audiences both nationally and internationally.
sources: [Reuters - Ambongo investigated over political remarks](https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/africans-root-first-black-pope-modern-history-2025-04-22/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As a Conventual Franciscan, Cardinal Bustillo values liturgical practices that resonate with local cultures and promote active participation. He encourages liturgies that are accessible and meaningful to the faithful, fostering a deeper connection to the Eucharist and the Church's traditions.

[François-Xavier Bustillo - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/francois-xavier-bustillo/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Scherer firmly upholds traditional Catholic teachings on moral issues. He has opposed attempts to liberalize Brazil's abortion laws and maintains the Church's stance on contraception, emphasizing personal responsibility within doctrinal boundaries. His positions reflect a conservative approach to moral doctrine.

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Scherer supports the liturgical reforms of the Second Vatican Council and has criticized radical traditionalist interpretations of the 'Mass of All Time.' He emphasizes adherence to the living Magisterium and has taken disciplinary actions against clergy who reject post-conciliar liturgical norms.
sources: [Brazilian cardinal slams radtrad claims on X](https://wherepeteris.com/brazilian-cardinal-slams-radtrad-claims-on-x/)
[Odilo Scherer - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odilo_Scherer)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Scherer is actively engaged in social issues, advocating for the poor and addressing environmental concerns. He has participated in initiatives promoting sustainable development and has defended the Church's social programs against political criticism.

[Odilo Scherer - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odilo_Scherer)

[Brazil's Cardinal Odilo Scherer: The man who would be pope?](https://theworld.org/stories/2016/07/30/brazils-cardinal-odilo-scherer-man-who-would-be-pope)

name: Juan de la Caridad García Rodríguez

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Juan de la Caridad García Rodríguez upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, particularly on issues like abortion and marriage. While there are no explicit public statements on topics such as same-sex unions, his leadership within the Cuban Church suggests a conservative stance aligned with the Vatican's positions.

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Operating within the complex sociopolitical landscape of Cuba, Cardinal García Rodríguez has focused on pastoral initiatives that support families and communities. doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Cabrera Herrera upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, particularly on issues such as abortion and gender ideology. He has vocally opposed the legalization of abortion in Ecuador, stating that judges who supported it incurred latae sententiae excommunication. While he welcomed the Vatican's document 'Fiducia Supplicans' on blessings for same-sex couples, he emphasized that marriage is only between a man and a woman and cautioned against any liturgical simulation of marriage for same-sex couples. His positions reflect a conservative stance on moral doctrine.
sources: [Cardinal Luis Gerardo Cabrera Herrera, O.F.M.](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/cardinal-luis-gerardo-cabrera-herrera-o-f-m/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As a Franciscan, Cardinal Cabrera Herrera values simplicity and accessibility in liturgy. While there is no specific information on his liturgical preferences, his Franciscan background suggests a balanced approach that respects tradition while embracing pastoral needs.
sources: [Luis Cabrera Herrera - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Cabrera_Herrera)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Cabrera Herrera is actively engaged in sociopolitical issues in Ecuador. He has been a vocal advocate for addressing the root causes of violence and poverty, criticizing government policies that rely solely on militarization. He emphasizes the need for education, employment, and social programs to combat crime and improve living conditions.
sources: [Cardinal Cabrera Herrera: 'The situation has deteriorated'](https://www.agensir.it/mondo/2025/04/10/cardinal-cabrera-herrera-the-situation-has-deteriorated/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Cabrera Herrera is closely aligned with Pope Francis. Appointed as Archbishop of Guayaquil by Pope Francis in 2015 and created cardinal in 2024, he has been entrusted with significant responsibilities, including serving as a delegate president at the Synod on Synodality. His leadership reflects support for the Pope's vision of a synodal and pastoral Church.
sources: [Luis Cabrera Herrera - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Cabrera_Herrera)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Cabrera Herrera has demonstrated a commitment to interreligious dialogue. He served as the executive secretary of the Ecumenism Commission of the Ecuadorian Episcopal Conference from 1996 to 2003, indicating his engagement in promoting unity among different faith communities.
sources: [Luis Cabrera Herrera - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Cabrera_Herrera)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity and effective communication, Cardinal Cabrera Herrera addresses complex societal issues with clarity and compassion. He emphasizes the Church's role in promoting peace and social justice, engaging with both the faithful and broader society.

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Roche upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, including opposition to abortion and same-sex marriage. liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Despite being Prefect of the Dicastery for Divine Worship, Cardinal Roche has strongly enforced restrictions on the Traditional Latin Mass, describing it as 'overly elaborate' and emphasizing uniformity with the Novus Ordo. His actions reflect a critical stance toward traditionalist liturgical expressions and a preference for post-Vatican II liturgical norms.
sources: [The Times](https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/old-latin-mass-is-too-elaborate-says-popes-enforcer-cardinal-5c8nlrlqz)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Roche has not been prominently involved in sociopolitical issues. His focus remains primarily on liturgical matters, with limited public engagement on topics such as ecology, migration, or social justice. This suggests a moderate stance, neither actively progressive nor overtly conservative in sociopolitical engagement.
sources: [Catholic Bishops' Conference of England and Wales](https://www.cbcew.org.uk/arthur-roche/)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Roche is a close collaborator of Pope Francis, having been appointed to key positions within the Vatican's liturgical hierarchy. He has expressed unreserved praise for the Pope and has been a key figure in implementing Francis's liturgical reforms, reflecting strong alignment with the Pope's vision for the Church.
sources: [The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/arthur-roche/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: While Cardinal Roche has not been a leading figure in interreligious dialogue, his previous involvement with organizations like Bradford Churches for Dialogue and Diversity indicates an openness to ecumenical and interfaith engagement, albeit not as a central focus of his ministry.

communication.comment: Cardinal Roche is known for his pastoral sensitivity and effective communication, particularly in explaining complex liturgical reforms. sources: [The Catholic Herald](https://thecatholicherald.com/exclusive-interview-cardinal-roche-if-they-only-knew-that-most-days-i-celebrate-mass-in-latin/)

sources: [Cristóbal López Romero - Vatican Press Office](https://press.vatican.va/content/salastampa/en/documentation/cardinali_biografie/cardinali_bio_lopezromero_c.html)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal You Heung-sik upholds traditional Catholic moral teachings, particularly emphasizing the sanctity of priestly celibacy. He has countered calls for allowing priests to marry, indicating a commitment to established doctrines. While he advocates for pastoral care and compassion, there is no public record of him supporting progressive changes on issues like same-sex unions or abortion.
sources: [THE UPCOMING CONCLAVE: A Close Look at the ... - RORATE CÆLI](https://rorate-caeli.blogspot.com/2024/12/the-upcoming-conclave-close-look-at.html)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal You demonstrates a balanced approach to liturgy, respecting traditional practices while being open to cultural expressions of faith. His emphasis on the richness of Eastern spirituality suggests an appreciation for diverse liturgical traditions within the universal Church.
sources: [Pope invites faithful to learn from 'spiritual and ecclesial way of life ...](https://www.licas.news/2023/03/03/pope-invites-faithful-to-learn-from-spiritual-and-ecclesial-way-of-life-of-asia/)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal You has actively engaged in sociopolitical issues, particularly advocating for peace on the Korean Peninsula. His visits to North Korea and leadership in Caritas Korea reflect a commitment to humanitarian efforts and social justice.
sources: [Lazarus You Heung-sik - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lazarus_You_Heung-sik)

rapport_au_pape.comment: As Prefect of the Dicastery for the Clergy, appointed by Pope Francis, Cardinal You is a close collaborator of the Pope. His initiatives align with the Pope's vision for a synodal and pastoral Church, emphasizing ongoing formation and support for clergy.
sources: [Cardinal You Heung-sik: I pray for my fellow priests every day](https://www.clerus.va/en/news/2024/cardinal-you-heung-sik-i-pray-for-my-fellow-priests-every-day.html)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal You has shown a commitment to interreligious dialogue, particularly through his involvement in peace initiatives between North and South Korea. His efforts indicate an openness to collaboration with other faith traditions for the common good.
sources: [Lazarus You Heung-sik - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lazarus_You_Heung-sik)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity, Cardinal You emphasizes the importance of listening and accompaniment in his communication. His approach fosters a sense of closeness and understanding within the Church community.
sources: [A conversation with the Prefect of the Dicastery for the Clergy](https://catholicoutlook.org/a-conversation-with-the-prefect-of-the-dicastery-for-the-clergy/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Brenes upholds traditional Catholic moral doctrine, particularly on issues such as abortion and family. While he has not made many public statements on homosexuality or other progressive moral debates, his leadership within a historically conservative Latin American episcopate and his positions on life issues suggest a moderately conservative stance.
sources: [Wikipedia - Leopoldo José Brenes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leopoldo_Brenes)
[The College of Cardinals Report - Brenes](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/leopoldo-jose-brenes-solorzano/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: Cardinal Brenes promotes a liturgical style that respects tradition without rigid attachment to the pre-Vatican II rites. There is no strong indication of liturgical innovation or traditionalist tendencies, suggesting a centrist liturgical orientation.
sources: [Wikipedia - Leopoldo José Brenes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leopoldo_Brenes)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Brenes has been outspoken in defense of human rights and democratic values in Nicaragua, particularly amid government repression. He has called for peace and dialogue in times of crisis, positioning himself as a voice for justice and reconciliation.
sources: [The Tablet: Cardinal Brenes urges Nicaraguan government to stop repression](https://www.thetablet.co.uk/news/10458/cardinal-brenes-urges-nicaraguan-government-to-stop-repression)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal Brenes is a close ally of Pope Francis. He was elevated to the cardinalate by Francis in 2014 and shares the Pope’s vision of a pastoral, dialogical Church engaged with society. His leadership in CELAM also reflects alignment with the Franciscan agenda for the Latin American Church.
sources: [Catholic News Agency - Pope Francis names Nicaraguan archbishop to College of Cardinals](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/29279/pope-francis-names-nicaraguan-archbishop-to-college-of-cardinals)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Brenes has shown openness to ecumenical and interreligious collaboration, especially in the context of promoting peace and defending the rights of minorities. While there are few highly publicized examples, his pastoral approach aligns with fostering dialogue.
sources: [The College of Cardinals Report - Brenes](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/leopoldo-jose-brenes-solorzano/)

communication.comment: Cardinal Brenes is known for his humility and pastoral style. He maintains a close connection with the faithful, often emphasizing the Church’s role in building peace and hope. His tone is conciliatory and consistent with Pope Francis’s pastoral ethos.
sources: [Catholic News Agency - Profile of Cardinal Brenes](https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/29279/pope-francis-names-nicaraguan-archbishop-to-college-of-cardinals)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Rossi upholds traditional Catholic teachings on moral issues, including opposition to abortion. He has stated that 'abortion is not a religious issue' but a broader ethical concern, reflecting a nuanced approach that emphasizes the universal value of life beyond religious boundaries.
sources: [Cardinal Ángel Sixto Rossi, S.J. - The College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/angel-sixto-rossi/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal José Cobo Cano maintains a conservative stance on moral doctrine. He has publicly opposed same-sex marriage, likening it to 'celebrating the Eucharist with Coca-Cola', and has affirmed traditional Catholic teachings on sexuality. doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Jozef De Kesel has demonstrated a progressive approach to moral doctrine. He has publicly questioned the Church's stance on mandatory priestly celibacy, suggesting that those for whom celibacy is humanly impossible should also have the chance of becoming priests. Additionally, he has supported the blessing of same-sex unions, emphasizing that such blessings are not to be understood as recognizing a different form of marriage but rather as acknowledging the commitment and love between individuals. These positions indicate a willingness to engage with contemporary societal issues and adapt pastoral practices accordingly.
sources: [Wikipedia - Jozef De Kesel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jozef_De_Kesel)

While he respects traditional liturgy, his approach suggests a balance between tradition and contemporary relevance.
