engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Castillo is deeply engaged in sociopolitical issues, often addressing topics like poverty, inequality, and political corruption. He has been vocal in criticizing governmental policies that he perceives as unjust, aligning with his commitment to social justice.
sources: [El Papa nombra cardenal en Perú a un progresista crítico con Dina Boluarte y el Congreso](https://elpais.com/america/2024-10-09/el-papa-nombra-cardenal-en-peru-a-un-progresista-critico-con-dina-boluarte-y-el-congreso.html)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Castillo shares the Pope's vision of a Church that is inclusive and attentive to the marginalized. His appointment as cardinal reflects this strong alignment.
sources: [Pope names theology professor to succeed cardinal in Lima](https://www.ncronline.org/news/pope-names-theology-professor-succeed-cardinal-lima)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: He promotes interreligious dialogue, emphasizing collaboration among different faiths to address common societal challenges, such as poverty and environmental issues.
sources: [New cardinals come from 17 nations, have diverse ministry experiences](https://news.diocesetucson.org/news/new-cardinals-come-from-17-nations-have-diverse-ministry-experiences)

communication.comment: Known for his effective communication, Cardinal Castillo engages with various audiences through homilies and public statements, often addressing contemporary issues with clarity and compassion.
sources: [El Papa nombra cardenal en Perú a un progresista crítico con Dina Boluarte y el Congreso](https://elpais.com/america/2024-10-09/el-papa-nombra-cardenal-en-peru-a-un-progresista-critico-con-dina-boluarte-y-el-congreso.html)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Steiner adopts a progressive stance on moral issues. He has publicly supported the legalization of civil unions for same-sex couples, emphasizing that Christians should not impose their morality on non-Christians. Additionally, he has advocated for the relaxation of clerical celibacy, suggesting openness to the ordination of married men in certain contexts.
sources: [Cardinal Steiner Supports the Legalization of Civil Unions for Homosexuals](https://fsspx.news/en/news/cardinal-steiner-supports-legalization-civil-unions-homosexuals-5822)
[The participants of the Synod: From very liberal to very conservative](https://english.katholisch.de/artikel/47448-the-participants-of-the-synod-from-very-liberal-to-very-conservative)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While respecting traditional liturgical practices, Cardinal Steiner supports liturgical adaptations that reflect local cultures, particularly in the Amazon region. His Franciscan background and emphasis on inculturation indicate a preference for a liturgy that resonates with indigenous traditions and the lived experiences of the faithful.
sources: [Card. Leonardo Steiner: A new spirit, of brotherhood, of coexistence](https://ofm.org/en/card-leonardo-steiner-a-new-spirit-of-brotherhood-of-coexistence.html)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Steiner is deeply committed to social justice, environmental protection, and the rights of indigenous peoples. He has been a vocal advocate for the Amazon rainforest, criticizing consumerist cultures and emphasizing the need to learn from indigenous communities to save the planet.
sources: [Amazon cardinal says consumerist cultures must learn from indigenous](https://www.ncronline.org/earthbeat/justice/amazon-cardinal-says-consumerist-cultures-must-learn-indigenous)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close ally of Pope Francis, Cardinal Steiner embodies the Pope's vision for a synodal and inclusive Church. His appointment as the first cardinal from the Amazon region underscores his alignment with the Pope's priorities, particularly regarding environmental issues and outreach to marginalized communities.
sources: [New Brazilian cardinal highlights Pope's concern for Amazon region](https://cruxnow.com/church-in-the-americas/2022/05/new-brazilian-cardinal-highlights-popes-concern-for-amazon-region)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Steiner has actively engaged in interreligious dialogue, fostering relationships with various faith communities. His efforts aim to promote unity and understanding among different religious traditions, reflecting a commitment to peaceful coexistence.
sources: [Leonardo Ulrich Steiner - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonardo_Ulrich_Steiner)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity and effective communication, Cardinal Steiner emphasizes listening and inclusivity. He encourages participation from all members of the Church, including laypeople and indigenous representatives, fostering a sense of community and shared mission.
sources: [Synod cardinal from Brazil: In the Amazon 'everyone votes, except ...](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2023/10/19/synod-synodality-amazon-bishops-246336)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Fernández upholds traditional Church teachings on issues like abortion and surrogacy, as reaffirmed in the 'Dignitas Infinita' document. However, he advocates for a more pastoral and inclusive approach towards LGBTQ+ individuals, emphasizing the Church's opposition to the criminalization of homosexuality and suggesting the need for more compassionate language in Church doctrine.
sources: [Le Monde](https://www.lemonde.fr/en/international/article/2024/04/09/gender-theory-surrogacy-trans-identity-lgbtq-issues-vatican-updates-the-catholic-church-s-doctrine_6667861_4.html)
[Reuters](https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/vatican-opposes-criminalisation-homosexuality-top-cardinal-says-2024-04-08/)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: As Archbishop of La Plata, Fernández implemented restrictions on the traditional Latin Mass, aligning with Pope Francis's emphasis on liturgical unity and accessibility. His approach reflects a preference for contemporary liturgical practices that foster active participation.
sources: [College of Cardinals Report](https://collegeofcardinalsreport.com/cardinals/victor-manuel-fernandez/)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Fernández emphasizes the Church's role in addressing social issues, including poverty, migration, and violence against women. He has been instrumental in highlighting these concerns in Vatican documents, reflecting a commitment to social justice and the dignity of all individuals.
sources: [USCCB](https://www.usccb.org/news/2024/vatican-says-abortion-surrogacy-war-poverty-are-attacks-human-dignity)
[Le Monde](https://www.lemonde.fr/en/international/article/2024/04/09/gender-theory-surrogacy-trans-identity-lgbtq-issues-vatican-updates-the-catholic-church-s-doctrine_6667861_4.html)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Fernández is a close confidant of Pope Francis, often referred to as his 'trusted theologian.' His appointment as Prefect of the Dicastery for the Doctrine of the Faith and his role in drafting key papal documents underscore his alignment with the Pope's vision for a more pastoral and inclusive Church.
sources: [America Magazine](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2023/07/01/francis-doctrine-vatican-fernandez-argentina-245630)
[Washington Post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2024/06/24/victor-manuel-fernandez-vatican-pope-threats/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Fernández values interreligious dialogue, particularly with the Jewish community. His openness to engaging with other faith traditions reflects a commitment to fostering mutual understanding and respect.
sources: [National Catholic Reporter](https://www.ncronline.org/opinion/guest-voices/new-vatican-doctrinal-head-values-dialogue-jews)

communication.comment: Known for his approachable and pastoral communication style, Fernández frequently engages with the media to explain Church teachings and address contemporary issues. His emphasis on dialogue and understanding aligns with his broader theological approach.
sources: [America Magazine](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2024/01/23/cardinal-fernandez-dicastery-doctrine-faith-247004)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal Hollerich has publicly called for a fundamental revision of the Church's teaching on homosexuality, stating that the sociological and scientific foundations of the current doctrine are outdated. He supports the blessing of same-sex unions and has expressed openness to the ordination of women, suggesting that the prohibition against female priests is not an infallible doctrinal decision and could change over time.
sources: [Top EU cardinal calls for change in church teaching on gay relationships](https://www.ncronline.org/news/quick-reads/top-eu-cardinal-calls-change-church-teaching-gay-relationships)
[Cardinal Hollerich Urges Caution, Dialogue on Women's Ordination](https://www.ncregister.com/cna/cardinal-hollerich-urges-caution-dialogue-on-women-s-ordination)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While not extensively documented, Cardinal Hollerich's support for liturgical blessings of same-sex couples and his openness to liturgical reforms suggest a progressive stance on liturgy and tradition.
sources: [Cardinal Hollerich and the Destabilization of Doctrine](https://www.ncregister.com/blog/cardinal-hollerich-and-the-destabilization-of-doctrine)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal Hollerich actively engages in sociopolitical issues, emphasizing the Church's role in addressing climate change and social justice. He has highlighted the necessity of tackling climate change to save humanity and has criticized the erosion of moral awareness among world leaders.
sources: [Cardinal Hollerich: 'Today we have politicians. Politicians have no convictions'](https://www.catholicworldreport.com/2024/05/25/cardinal-hollerich-today-we-have-politicians-politicians-have-no-convictions/)
[Cardinal Hollerich: Restoring a morality of peace](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/church/news/2025-03/cardinal-hollerich-europe-comece-rearmament-peace.html)

rapport_au_pape.comment: A close collaborator of Pope Francis, Cardinal Hollerich serves on the Council of Cardinals and was appointed as the relator general for the Synod on Synodality. He has expressed deep admiration for Pope Francis, describing him as a father figure and a living example.
sources: [Cardinal Hollerich: Pope Francis was a father, a living example](https://www.vaticannews.va/en/church/news/2025-04/cardinal-jean-claude-hollerich-interview-pope-death-synodality.html)
[HOLLERICH Card. Jean-Claude, S.I.](https://press.vatican.va/content/salastampa/en/documentation/cardinali_biografie/cardinali_bio_hollerich_jc.html)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal Hollerich actively promotes interreligious dialogue, emphasizing the importance of humility and learning from others. He acknowledges the diverse religious landscape of Luxembourg and advocates for dialogue and mutual understanding among different faiths.
sources: [Cardinal Hollerich: 'If women do not feel comfortable in the church ...](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2024/07/12/cardinal-hollerich-synod-248352)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral sensitivity and effective communication, Cardinal Hollerich engages with the faithful through thoughtful homilies and public statements. He emphasizes the Church's role in addressing contemporary societal challenges while remaining rooted in tradition.
sources: [Cardinal Hollerich guides synod with a gentle hand](https://religionnews.com/2023/10/20/cardinal-hollerich-guides-synod-with-a-gentle-hand/)

doctrine_morale.comment: Cardinal McElroy advocates for a more inclusive approach to Church teachings on moral issues. He has emphasized the importance of welcoming LGBTQ+ individuals and has questioned the exclusion of divorced and remarried Catholics from the Eucharist. His stance suggests a progressive interpretation of moral doctrine, focusing on conscience and pastoral care over strict adherence to traditional norms.
sources: [Cardinal McElroy on 'radical inclusion' for L.G.B.T. people, women](https://www.americamagazine.org/faith/2023/01/24/mcelroy-synodality-inclusion-244587)

[Cardinal McElroy's Attack on Church Teachings on Sexuality Is a Pastoral Disaster](https://www.ncregister.com/commentaries/cardinal-mcelroy-s-attack-on-church-teachings-on-sexuality-is-a-pastoral-disaster)

liturgie_et_tradition.comment: While Cardinal McElroy respects traditional liturgical practices, he supports adaptations that reflect contemporary pastoral needs. His emphasis on synodality and inclusivity indicates a willingness to embrace liturgical reforms that resonate with diverse communities.
sources: [Cardinal McElroy on the Voices of Synodal Dialogue](https://www.commonwealmagazine.org/cardinal-mcelroy-voices-synodal-dialogue)

engagement_sociopolitique.comment: Cardinal McElroy is actively engaged in sociopolitical issues, particularly advocating for the rights of migrants and the marginalized. He has criticized policies that he perceives as unjust, emphasizing the Church's role in promoting social justice and human dignity.
sources: [Cardinal McElroy, immigration advocates warn US at a moral crossroad](https://www.ncronline.org/news/cardinal-mcelroy-immigration-advocates-warn-us-moral-crossroad-migrants)
[Cardinal McElroy calls for compassion in immigration policy](https://apnews.com/article/58c728cef89a25d606406014693af85e)

rapport_au_pape.comment: Cardinal McElroy is closely aligned with Pope Francis, sharing his vision for a more inclusive and compassionate Church. His appointment as Archbishop of Washington, D.C., reflects the Pope's trust in his leadership and commitment to ecclesial reform.
sources: [Pope names like-minded ally Cardinal McElroy as Washington archbishop](https://apnews.com/article/8390173f467e13a9ea8387aea5d0316c)
[Cardinal McElroy reflects on Pope Francis, San Diego, immigration](https://www.nbcsandiego.com/news/local/cardinal-robert-mcelroys-farewell-to-san-diego/3765690/)

dialogue_interreligieux.comment: Cardinal McElroy supports interreligious dialogue, emphasizing the importance of understanding and cooperation among different faith traditions. His approach aligns with the Church's commitment to fostering unity and mutual respect.
sources: [What is Interreligious Dialogue?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u1Z1mF5_GLw)

communication.comment: Known for his pastoral and empathetic communication style, Cardinal McElroy emphasizes listening and dialogue. His leadership reflects a commitment to engaging with diverse perspectives within the Church and society.
sources: [Cardinal McElroy on the Voices of Synodal Dialogue](https://www.commonwealmagazine.org/cardinal-mcelroy-voices-synodal-dialogue)
